results.name: default/wordpress-lb

error.Text: Service has not ready endpoints, pods: [Pod/wordpress-fb6795cb7-r6kc2 Pod/wordpress-fb6795cb7-n5p76 Pod/wordpress-fb6795cb7-jkmnb], expected 3
Service default/wordpress-lb has event Failed to create endpoint for service default/wordpress-lb: endpoints "wordpress-lb" already exists

results.details:
Error: The service "wordpress-lb" has no ready endpoints because the endpoint already exists, causing a conflict.

Solution: 1. Delete the existing endpoint: `kubectl delete endpoints wordpress-lb`. 2. Restart the service: `kubectl rollout restart deployment wordpress`. 3. Verify endpoints: `kubectl get endpoints wordpress-lb`.

results.name: default/wordpress-fb6795cb7-jkmnb

error.Text: Readiness probe failed: HTTP probe failed with statuscode: 500

results.details:
Error: The readiness probe failed because the application returned a 500 status code, indicating an internal server error.

Solution: 
1. Check application logs for errors.
2. Ensure all dependencies are running.
3. Verify configuration settings.
4. Restart the application.
